summary: Valhalla VintageVerb 4.0.0 Update. New Reverb Modes: Chamber1979 and Hall1984. - We are happy to announce the ValhallaVintageVerb 4.0.0 update. The big news: we’ve added two new reverb modes, Chamber1979 and Hall1984! Elements Of The Past Chamber1979 is inspired by the Chamber algorithm in a renowned digital reverb from the late 1970s. I’ve been messing around with this algorithm for over a decade, but it wasn’t...
